gist.summary: Added a new /audio/models endpoint to the API, allowing developers to programmatically list available audio generation models.
gist.impact: Users can now dynamically discover supported audio models and filter them based on API key permissions, mirroring the functionality of text and image endpoints.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee wearing headphones, reviewing a floating pixelated menu of musical notes and cassette tapes. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
